alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 152 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Neptune Beach to Nas Jax. Movement was south at 15 mph. Craig Airfield gusted to 44 mph as the storms went through that location. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Arlington, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach and Neptune Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. For boaters on or near the St Johns River or Intracoastal waterway, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Duval
